Class ContinuousIntegrationServer

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.AbstractLifeCycle
org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.ContainerLifeCycle
org.eclipse.jetty.server.handler.AbstractHandler
se.ciserver.ContinuousIntegrationServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.jetty.server.Handler, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Container, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Destroyable, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Dumpable, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Dumpable.DumpableContainer, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.LifeCycle
public class ContinuousIntegrationServer extends org.eclipse.jetty.server.handler.AbstractHandler
A Jetty-based CI-server that can start locally and receive HTTP-requests.

  • Constructor Details

    • ContinuousIntegrationServer

      public ContinuousIntegrationServer(String accessToken) throws Exception
      Constructs the ContinuousIntegrationServer and starts a HttpClient
      Parameters:
      accessToken - A githubs access token with commit status permission for the repository
      Throws:
      Exception - if httpClient fails to start

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public void handle(String target, org.eclipse.jetty.server.Request baseRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException, javax.servlet.ServletException
      Handles incoming HTTP requests for the CI server and presents necessary information.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface org.eclipse.jetty.server.Handler
      Specified by:
      handle in class org.eclipse.jetty.server.handler.AbstractHandler
      Parameters:
      target - - The requested URL
      baseRequest - - Jetty-specific request object, used to mark the request as handled
      request - - Standard Java Servlet request
      response - - Standard Java Servlet response
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input/output error occurs when reading the request or writing the response
      javax.servlet.ServletException - If an internal Jetty/Servlet error occurs while handling the request

    • setCommitStatus

      public void setCommitStatus(String url, String status, String description, String context)
      Send a POST request setting the status of a github commit
      Parameters:
      url - - The url of the commit
      status - - The status to set for the commit, "success", "failure" or "pending"
      description - - Description of the status
      context - - The system setting the status

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception
      Starts the CI-server in command line
      Parameters:
      args - - Command-line arguments, 1: a github access token to the repository
      Throws:
      Exception - If the server fails to start or join the thread.
